mapper.sql: SELECT oi.id "id", oi.order_id "order_id", oi.cocktail_id "cocktail_id", oi.quantity "quantity", oi.price "price", o.regdate AS "order.regdate", o.id AS "order.id", o.number AS "order.number", o.user_id AS "order.user_id", m.id "menu.id", m.name "menu.name" -- 칵테일 이름 추가 FROM ctt_order_item oi LEFT JOIN dbduck.ctt_menu m ON oi.cocktail_id = m.id JOIN ctt_order o ON oi.order_id = o.id
